unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies - Powering Up India, One Roof at a Time!**
normalised: Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies - Powering Up India, One Roof at a Time!

unnormalised: Hey folks, thinking of going solar? Now's the time! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) is still offering some sweet subsidies for rooftop solar installations, and they're a game-changer.
normalised: Hey folks, thinking of going solar? Now is the time! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) is still offering some sweet subsidies for rooftop solar installations, and they are a game-changer.

unnormalised: Imagine, chilling on your terrace in Chennai, knowing your AC is powered by the sun – and saving you loads of Rs. on your electricity bill!
normalised: Imagine, chilling on your terrace in Chennai, knowing your A C is powered by the sun – and saving you loads of rupees on your electricity bill!

unnormalised: The subsidy scheme, particularly popular around Diwali and Onam, makes solar power way more accessible, especially for middle-class families in places like Bangalore and Ahmedabad. You can get subsidies up to 40% for systems up to 3kW, and even more for community projects! That's enough to power most of your appliances, so more biryani cooking without worrying about the electricity bill!
normalised: The subsidy scheme, particularly popular around Diwali and Onam, makes solar power way more accessible, especially for middle-class families in places like Bangalore and Ahmedabad. You can get subsidies up to forty percent for systems up to three kilowatt, and even more for community projects! That is enough to power most of your appliances, so more biryani cooking without worrying about the electricity bill!

unnormalised: Even housing societies are getting in on the action, installing larger systems on apartment complexes. Think cleaner energy and a fatter wallet. Plus, it's good karma. Check out your local discom website for details. Don't delay, claim yours today!
normalised: Even housing societies are getting in on the action, installing larger systems on apartment complexes. Think cleaner energy and a fatter wallet. Plus, it is good karma. Check out your local discom website for details. Do not delay, claim yours today!
